name: HomeGrove
storyline: There once was a deity, a divine spirit, loving and pure. For eons it would care for the land and for creatures of pure spirit. However a time finally came when the spirit had to die. Before passing, the deity created a small tribe of creatures to protect the land, and so they did. It was peaceful for an era, for so long in fact that their original purpose was all but forgotten. Then, suddenly, the peaceful times came to an end. Less intelligent creatures became aggressive, and new, strange creatures have appeared... but why?
summary: A blend of classic mechanics, some rarely seen in a sidescroller; meant to pay homage to the greats of the past while accomplishing a tasty new fusion of gameplay. Punch, Grab, Level Up, Cook, Collect, Unlock, Discover, Explore, and maybe play a tune!
